job description:
• Analyzes current operational functions and offers and implements improvements.
  • Maintains databases and extracts data for analysis.
  • Runs and reviews reports, analyzing results in support of operational functions.
  • \n\n
  • Bachelor's degree in statistics, computer science, mathematics, business, health care or a related field, OR
  • A two-year degree in computer science, business or a related field and two years of reporting and data analysis work experience, OR
  • Four years of reporting and data analysis experience.
\n\n

Preferred:
  • Medical reinsurance or insurance experience.
\n\n
  • Good organizational, customer-service, communications and analytical skills.
  • Ability to use complex mathematical calculations and understands mathematical and statistical concepts.
  • Knowledge of relevant computer support systems.
  • Microsoft Office skills.
  • Ability to acquire programming skills across various software platforms.
Preferred:
  • Experience with additional database software (Access, SQL, Tableau, PowerBI)
